page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER IN LONGBENTON
page.content: Crimes in the Longbenton area are theft, robbery and vandalism. People do these things because they are unemployed, they don't have enough money or they are criminals. I think it must be very sad to be burgled. The people who do it must be sick. Vandalism in this area is mostly done by teenagers or drunks. Silly children go glue sniffing near play schemes. We can stop crime by putting more policemen on the beat and also by having more neighbourhood watch schemes. I think the pubs should only sell beer to adults and they should only be allowed to sell certain amounts. I think it is a shame that crimes like this spoil Longbenton, otherwise it would be a better area.
